headline: CFDA and Ralph Lauren Announce Two New Grant Programs to Strengthen American Fashion Manufacturing
summary: NEW YORK, January 07, 2026--The CFDA and Ralph Lauren today announced two new initiatives designed to strengthen American fashion manufacturing.
